comments.content: this game is scary but very very very fun
LOL love this kind of CREEPY game troll!
I liked it! HOWEVER if you put in some jump scares and weird noises, this game would be AWESOME! but the clues and places to find things were very unique and cool.

Mostly good and pretty easy, but the box in the Church didn't make sense. I had to do the walkthrough before I tried switching the L and S...
